meanings.sent1: The diamond necklace was the spendiest item in the store.
meanings.sent2: That designer handbag is the spendiest one I've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat's taste in toys was as spendiest as a royal's.
meanings.sent4: The spendiest restaurant in town serves gold-plated desserts.
meanings.sent5: The spendiest car on the lot gleamed under the showroom lights.

meanings.definition: Incurring the highest cost or expenditure
meanings.sent1: The luxury cruise was the spendiest vacation they had ever taken.
meanings.sent2: Renovating the entire house turned out to be the spendiest project of all.
meanings.sent3: His spendiest habit was collecting rare coins from around the world.
meanings.sent4: The spendiest decision she made was to buy a house on a private island.
meanings.sent5: The spendiest option on the menu was the imported caviar dish.
